title: Your Shop endless loading
body: Title,shop isnt loading,tried restarting the client multiple times but didnt work

replies.body: I've started to notice a large number of reports of Your Shop not loading correctly. We're working on ironing out this issue as quick as we can. In the meantime, we can try refreshing your client and checking some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if we can get those offers to load!
Same in EUNE, it was working and I opened all promotions but now stuck in infinity loading.
NA infinite loading of the shop feels bad ...
Same in NA and LAN. for the past 2 hours.
